column4: hey, i am trying to install a special package, and i get this output Depends: libvorbis0a (>= 1.1.0) but 1.0.1-1 is to be installed, how can i get version 1.1.0 ???
anyone know how i can switch to the more experimental packages in my sources.list?
I suppose you could add the Breezy repos to your sources.list
Np, but it may not be that simple..You might want to google that..Could break things if you're not careful.
